block.p: The Department of Defense has identified 3,303 American service members who have died since the start of the Iraq war. It confirmed the deaths of the following Americans yesterday:

BASHAM, Robert J. 22, Staff Sgt., Army National Guard; Kenosha, Wis.; Headquarters and Headquarters Battery First Battalion, 126th Field Artillery. LANGENBRUNNER, Richard P., 19, Pfc., Army; Fort Wayne, Ind.; Third Infantry Division.
The Department of Defense has identified 3,303 American service members who have died since the start of the Iraq war. It confirmed the deaths of the following Americans yesterday:.
